book.synopsis:
The quiet New England town of Cape Light never seems to change. But starting in 1905, the lives of these four friends will be transformed in ways they never could have imagined.
In the fourth book in the series, love is in the air for Amanda, the most reserved and responsible of the Lighthouse Lane girls. After her mother passed away, Amanda

s preacher, and helping to raise her younger sister, Hannah. But as her romantic relationship with Jed develops, she is forced to take a closer look at herself and understand what she really wants in life.
